import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Button, Input } from '../Utils/Utils' import TokenService from '../../services/token-service.js' export default class LoginForm extends Component { static defaultProps = { onLoginSuccess: () => {} } state = { error: null } handleSubmitBasicAuth = ev => { ev.preventDefault() const { user_name, password } = ev.target TokenService.makeBasicAuthToken(user_name.value, password.value) user_name.value = '' password.value = '' this.props.onLoginSuccess() } render() { const { error } = this.state return (
{error &&

{error}

}
) } }
